properties.displayName: Windows Firewall Policy settings have changed
properties.query:
Event | where EventLog == "Microsoft-Windows-Windows Firewall With Advanced Security/Firewall" and EventID == 2008 | sort by TimeGenerated desc
// Oql: Type=Event EventLog="Microsoft-Windows-Windows Firewall With Advanced Security/Firewall" EventID=2008 // Args: {OQ: True; WorkspaceId: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000} // Settings: {PTT: True; SortI: True; SortF: True} // Version: 0.1.122
